item.title: Computer vision libraries
item.description: So, what else is there except for opencv… CCV CCV website, github CCV 0.7 comes with a sub-10% image classifier, a decent face detector. It runs on Mac OSX, Linux, FreeBSD, Windows*, iPhone, iPad, Android, Raspberry Pi. In fact, anything that has a proper C compiler probably can run ccv. The majority (with notable exception of convolutional networks, which requires a BLAS library) of ccv will just work with no compilation flags or dependencies.
